insert into shichang_wholesaleCommodity ( userId,releaseType,updateTime,createTime,pictureUrl,realNameId, serviceType,releaseTitle, detailed,addressDetailed,commodityPacking, cations,specifi, commodityJiage, commodityCountNo,commodityReserveNo,commoditySurplusNo, remarks,serviceIntroduction, reserve,deliveryType,deliveryCollect, startTime,endTime,authentiCationStatus,welfareStatus,selectedOptions
) values ( #{userId}, #{releaseType}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime},#{pictureUrl}, #{realNameId},#{serviceType},#{releaseTitle}, #{detailed},#{addressDetailed}, #{commodityPacking}, #{cations},#{specifi},#{commodityJiage}, #{commodityCountNo},#{commodityReserveNo},#{commoditySurplusNo}, #{remarks},#{serviceIntroduction}, #{reserve},#{deliveryType},#{deliveryCollect}, #{startTime},#{endTime},#{authentiCationStatus},#{welfareStatus}, #{selectedOptions} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from shichang_wholesaleCommodity where authentiCationStatus in(1,3) and releaseType=#{releaseType}

select id,userId,releaseType,serviceType, releaseTitle,detailed,addressDetailed,commodityPacking,cations,specifi, commodityJiage,commodityCountNo,serviceIntroduction, remarks,pictureUrl,deliveryType,deliveryCollect, startTime,endTime,reserve,createTime,updateTime, welfareStatus,authentiCationStatus,authentiCationFailure, examineName from shichang_wholesaleCommodity where authentiCationStatus in(1,3) and releaseType=#{releaseType} order by startTime desc limit #{pageLength}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from shichang_wholesaleCommodity where welfareStatus!=3 and id=#{id} and userId =#{userId}

select id,userId,releaseType,serviceType, releaseTitle,detailed,addressDetailed,commodityPacking,cations,specifi, commodityJiage,commodityCountNo,serviceIntroduction, remarks,pictureUrl,deliveryType,deliveryCollect, startTime,endTime,reserve,selectedOptions,createTime from shichang_wholesaleCommodity where userId=#{userId} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update shichang_wholesaleCommodity set updateTime= #{updateTime},pictureUrl= #{pictureUrl}, realNameId=#{realNameId},releaseTitle=#{releaseTitle}, detailed=#{detailed},addressDetailed=#{addressDetailed}, commodityPacking=#{commodityPacking}, cations=#{cations},specifi=#{specifi},commodityJiage=#{commodityJiage}, commodityCountNo=#{commodityCountNo},commodityReserveNo=#{commodityReserveNo}, commoditySurplusNo=#{commoditySurplusNo}, remarks=#{remarks},serviceIntroduction=#{serviceIntroduction}, reserve=#{reserve},deliveryType=#{deliveryType},deliveryCollect=#{deliveryCollect}, startTime=#{startTime},endTime=#{endTime},authentiCationStatus=#{authentiCationStatus}, welfareStatus=#{welfareStatus}, selectedOptions=#{selectedOptions},authentiCationFailure=#{authentiCationFailure} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,userId,releaseType,serviceType, releaseTitle,detailed,addressDetailed,commodityPacking,cations,specifi, commodityJiage,commoditySurplusNo,serviceIntroduction, remarks,pictureUrl,deliveryType,deliveryCollect, startTime,endTime,reserve,createTime, evaluateid,servicFrequenc,realNameId from shichang_wholesaleCommodity where id=#{id} and welfareStatus=1

select serviceType,commodityPacking ,cations,specifi from shichang_wholesaleCommodity where selectedOptions like #{selectedOptions} and releaseType=#{releaseType} and authentiCationStatus=2 GROUP BY serviceType,commodityPacking ,cations,specifi order by serviceType
